p.d: Filmed in Rotterdam on their 2007 tour in support of the 'Snakes And Arrows' album, this concert captures Rush at their very best in front of a fervent Dutch audience. Rush are one of the most successful rock acts of all time with worldwide album sales estimated in excess of 40 million units and with a line-up unchanged since 1974. 'Snakes And Arrows' was the band's first new album of original material for five years and was a both critically acclaimed and commercially successful going to No.3 in both the USA and Canada and to No.13 in the UK. The tour in support of the album traversed the globe and finally drew to a close in August 2008. This concert provides a permanent reminder of the stunning stageshow that was 'Snakes And Arrows Live'.
